#summary Edit Menu

=Edit Menu=

The following commands are available from the Edit menu:

  * [SpellChecking Check Spelling]
  * [Prefixes Configure Prefixes/Auto-Say]
  * Input1 Multi-Line Mode
  * Input2 Multi-Line Mode
  * Convert...
    * Returns to `%r`
    * Spaces to `%b`
    * Escape Special Characters
